H0.text: who did puss in boots grew up with. Little Red Riding Hood

H1.text: who did puss in boots grew up with. Tom Thumb

H2.text: who did puss in boots grew up with. Goldilocks

H3.text: who did puss in boots grew up with. Humpty Dumpty

A4.text: The youngest son is left with only a cat.

A5.text: He becomes friends with Humpty Alexander Dumpty, another resident of the orphanage who gives him the name 'Puss' and with whom he decides to find the magic beans that would bring them to the Golden Goose (which lays golden eggs).
